outputs.output_descr:
National Human Development Report: Doing Right Things Right is the first comprehensive analysis of capacities for social inclusion observed through decentralization process and from human development prism, in Montenegro. With rationale that social inclusion is the ultimate outcome of the process both of 'addressing social exclusion' and 'improving local governments' capacity'.
It will provide objective insight into capacities for social inclusion in Montenegro presenting human development perspective beyond EU integration agenda i.e. focusing on vision of Montenegro in 2030. The Report will introduce new data, analysis and recommendations that will serve as the basis for formulating priority strategic, policy goals, programming that might be utilized by national and local governments and other stakeholders involved in creating and implementing Social Inclusion policies in Montenegro.

project_descr: The NHDR considers the status of human capital, the trends in its formation/depletion, the institutional mechanisms involved, and it will make recommendations on improving the efficiency of human capital formation and utilization.
